title: Privacy and Opt Out Notices for Financial Information
content:
Privacy and Opt Out Notices for Financial Information

State Regulations
§ 420.4 - Initial privacy notice to consumers required
§ 420.5 - Annual privacy notice to customers required
§ 420.6 - Information to be included in privacy notices
§ 420.7 - Form of opt out notice to consumers and opt out methods
§ 420.8 - Revised privacy notices
§ 420.9 - Delivery

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
